ygData.subject: Re: Preston goes AFK
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Yes, he does have a battery backup which is not really detectable on energy scanners.  He has a main power core which is, and that s the one that s gone

OOC: Yes, he does have a battery backup which is not really detectable on e=
nergy scanners.  He has a main power core which is, and that's the one that=
's gone dangerously low, nearly putting him in stasis lock.  But he also ha=
s a tiny backup battery which has never been tapped into so this is the one=
 he's using now.  This little battery backup has ninety five percent power,=
 but unlike his main battery, it can not power his weaponry.  It can only p=
ower his transformation between robot and SUV mode.  He really can not figh=
t Rodimus at this time, yet he is going to exchange a moment of idolness be=
tween them, then he'll just switch back to SUV mode, and he knows now is no=
t the time to fight.  He has no power for that.  It's an emergency backup w=
hich allows for escape but nothing more.
